content: invisible join with the first st of the last round see page 2 fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto the hat horns make 2 place a marker in your first single_crochet to mark the start of each round each round ends in the stitch before the marker do not join at the end of the rounds as you will work in continuous rounds begin with b make a magic_ring round 1 chain 1 3 single_crochet in magic_ring pull tail to close circle do not join 3 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in next st 3 times 6 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in each st around 6 single_crochet finishing fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto the hat assembly sew the snout onto the front the ears horns and spikes onto top and embroider the eyes snout take the snout and thread the tail through your darning needle attach it to the hat in the desired position by running your needle up and down through both the snout and the hat around the snout use stitch markers to hold snout in place if needed cut and weave the ends inside the hat take one of your spikes and thread the tail through your darning needle attach it to the hat in spikes the desired position by sewing along the base of the spike use stitch markers to hold spike in place if needed cut and weave in the ends inside the hat repeat with all spikes making sure they are in a straight line take one of your ears and thread the tail on your darning needle attach it to the hat in the ears desired position by sewing along the base of the ear use stitch markers to hold the ear in place if needed cut and weave the ends inside the hat repeat the process with the second ear ensuring symmetrical spacing take one of your horns and thread the tail through your darning needle attach it to the hat in horns the desired position by sewing along the base of the horn use stitch markers to hold horn in place if needed cut and weave in the ends inside the hat repeat the process with the second horn ensuring symmetrical spacing are symmetrical make 2 step 1 stitch a five-pointed star the size of the finished eye in your chosen location following the diagram below begin with threaded needle behind work bring needle to front from the middle and push back in at the arrowheads 5 times in the order of your choice bring needle back to front from the middle one more time when star is completed step 2 weave needle over one point and under the next always going in the same direction continue
